      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Covalent bonds between carbon and hydrogen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kovalente Bindungen zwischen Carbon und 
Wasserstoff</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Obligations covalentes entre le carbone et 
l'hydrogène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ligações covalent entre o carbono e o 
hidrogênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legami covalenti fra carbonio ed idrogeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομοιοπολικοί δεσμοί μεταξύ του άνθρακα και του 
υδρογόνου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enlaces covalentes entre el carbón y el 
hidrógeno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the strong covalent bonds between carbon and hydrogen atoms inside each methane molecule and the weak intermolecular forces between the molecules.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boiling point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">covalent bonds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrocarbons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">intermolecular forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">melting point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">methane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die starken kovalenten 
Bindungen zwischen Carbon und Wasserstoffatomen innerhalb jedes 
Methanmoleküls und die schwachen intermolekularen Kräfte zwischen 
den Molekülen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre les obligations covalentes 
fortes entre le carbone et les atomes d'hydrogène à l'intérieur de 
chaque molécule de méthane et les forces intermoléculaires faibles 
entre les molécules.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra as ligações covalent 
fortes entre o carbono e os átomos do hidrogênio dentro de cada 
molécula do methane e as forças intermolecular fracas entre as 
moléculas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra i legami covalenti forti fra
carbonio e gli atomi dell'idrogeno all'interno di ogni molecola del 
metano e le forze intermolecolari deboli fra le molecole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει τους ισχυρούς 
ομοιοπολικούς δεσμούς μεταξύ των ατόμων άνθρακα και υδρογόνου 
μέσα σε κάθε μόριο μεθανίου και αδύνατες διαμοριακές δυνάμεις 
μεταξύ των μορίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra los enlaces covalentes 
fuertes entre el carbón y los átomos del hidrógeno dentro de cada 
molécula del metano y las fuerzas intermoleculares débiles entre las
moléculas.</string>
          </description>
